text:
If you're old, infirm or have underlying health issues, by all means get the #vaccine. Most us us don't need it, though. Most of us were never at risk throughout this paranoia. I won't play into it! #IWillNOTGetVaccinated!

#covid19 #Pfizer #coronavirus #nhs #facemasks #lockdown https://t.co/ykLZEEcaZS
